name: Fix The Sub
description:
Made for Crudle Jam #9
Theme: Worn Thin

Your sub is damaged and you must fix it before the O2 runs out (the oxygen is wearing thin). 


Like so many, I have been into Among Us and I wanted to try to make the task system which is how this game came about. It was a fun process and I hope you enjoy the game. 

I ran out of time so the game is a little light on juice and sound. I will update soon.

Good Luck!
